content.title: Four Fundamental Forces at the Planck Scale: Toward Unification
content.abstract: A comprehensive comparison of the four fundamental forces—gravity, electromagnetism, weak, and strong—at various energy scales, showing how they converge near the Planck scale and why this suggests unification.

overview.key_question: Why are the forces so different at everyday energies but may unify at Planck scale?
overview.answer: Coupling constants 'run' with energy; at E ~ E_P, they may become comparable

electroweak_scale.note: Electroweak unification: EM and weak merge into SU(2) × U(1)

gut_scale.note: Strong, EM, Weak may unify into SU(5) or SO(10)

planck_scale.note: All forces become comparable—full unification possible

gravitational_coupling.interpretation: Gravity's coupling depends on mass; becomes O(1) at m = m_P
gravitational_coupling.significance: Gravity is weak because particles are light compared to m_P

running_couplings.explanation: Coupling 'constants' are not constant—they depend on energy scale
running_couplings.mechanism: Virtual particle loops screen or anti-screen the charge

examples.behavior: α increases with energy (screening by e⁺e⁻ pairs)

grand_unified_theories.combines: Strong + Electroweak into SU(5), SO(10), or E₆
grand_unified_theories.predictions: Proton decay (not yet observed, τ > 10³⁴ years)

supersymmetry.scale: SUSY partners at 1-10 TeV (not yet found at LHC)

string_theory.mechanism: All forces from vibrating string modes
string_theory.status: Theoretical framework; no direct predictions tested

planck_unification.idea: At E ~ E_P, α_G ~ 1, all forces comparable
planck_unification.challenge: Need quantum gravity theory to describe this regime
planck_unification.possibilities: New symmetries, extra dimensions, or emergent spacetime

key_comparisons.interpretation: EM wins by 10³⁹ at atomic scales
Strong force overwhelms gravity at nuclear scales

key_comparisons.at_mz: Comparable: α_W ~ α at Z mass
key_comparisons.interpretation: Weak appears weak due to heavy W/Z masses

key_results: At low energy: Strong(1) >> EM(10⁻²) >> Weak(10⁻⁵) >> Gravity(10⁻³⁸)
Grand unification may occur at ~10¹⁶ GeV
Gravity becomes strong (α_G ~ 1) at Planck scale E_P ~ 10¹⁹ GeV
Full unification of all forces may require quantum gravity
